    • Method Detail

      • flatMap

        public static void flatMap(XMCommand command,
                           Map<String,XMCommand> commands)
        Flattens a XMCommand instance's hierarchy and adds it to the specified map. For example: A dispatcher command with the name, "command" contains a subcommand with the name "subcommand". Using this method on the dispatcher command will add the dispatcher command and subcommand to the map as "command" and "command subcommand" respectively.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to be flatten
        commands - the map to add the flatten commands to

      • getArgumentOrDefault

        public static <T> T getArgumentOrDefault(T[] args,
                                         int index,
                                         T defaultArgument)
        Checks if the index specified is within the boundaries of the array and returns the value at the index specified or the default argument if the index is out of bounds.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type
        Parameters:
        args - the array to get the argument from
        index - the index at which to obtain the argument from
        defaultArgument - the default value if the argument cannot be obtained
        Returns:
        the argument at the specified index or the default value specified if the argument cannot be found

      • trimArguments

        public static String[] trimArguments(String[] args)
        Removes the first value from the array and returns it. Returns an empty array if the array specified is less than or equal to 1.
        Parameters:
        args - the array to be trimmed
        Returns:
        the trimmed array
